item.vauban.buffer.tooltip0: Reroutes items to nearby pipes if the target pipe is full
item.vauban.filter.tooltip0: Filters items on a per-side basis
item.vauban.filter.tooltip1: Shift-click a slot to set its filter to your cursor stack
item.vauban.filter.tooltip2: Shift-click a slot with an empty cursor to put a barrier on it
item.vauban.filter.tooltip3: Shift-click a slot again to remove a filter
item.vauban.filter.tooltip5: If any slot on a given side has a filter, that whole side will
item.vauban.filter.tooltip6: reject items being inserted into any non-filtered slot
item.vauban.redstone_pipe.tooltip0: Emits a redstone pulse into the inventory when it deposits an item
item.vauban.redstone_pipe.tooltip1: Works great with dispensers and droppers!
